node.title: Helpful Tips & Information to Protect BTT Holders in the World of Blockchain

node.title: Control D Accepts BTT. Take Back Control of your Browsing and Improve your Privacy.
node.excerpt: Control D now accepts BitTorrent Token (BTT) as a payment method for its easy to use, completely customizable DNS service. Developed by our friends at Windscribe VPN, Control D is a standalone service that does almost everything a VPN can, and many things a VPN cannot. With no install required, Control D blocks ads and tracking,…

node.title: BitTorrent has a New Help Center!
node.excerpt: As part of our efforts to upgrade the customer support experience, we are pleased to announce the launch of a new BitTorrent Help Center. navText.Your purchase of digital coins via credi: Your purchase of digital coins via credit card is facilitated by a third party service provider, Simplex Payment Services UAB.
navText.BitTorrent does not facilitate this tran: BitTorrent does not facilitate this transaction and expressly disclaims all warranties related to this third party service.
navText.The crypto amount quoted is based on the: The crypto amount quoted is based on the current rate and is not final.
navText.If the rate changes by more than +/-2.5%: If the rate changes by more than +/-2.5% you will be asked to reconfirm the transaction via email from Simplex.
navText.BTT is not available for direct purchase: BTT is not available for direct purchase from all geographic locations.
navText.If you have any questions, please contac: If you have any questions, please contact Simplex customer support at support@simplex.com.
